snippet.title: Half-Life 2: Episode Two - The Great Forever Tomorrow Gameplay
snippet.description:
This is a gameplay montage of the very strange mod "The Great Forever Tomorrow" for HL2: Episode Two that I recorded a while back for PlanetPhillip (http://www.planetphillip.com/). It has some very unconventional gameplay and strange scenery, and it makes use of much music throughout which I found to be quite memorable.

Details:
http://www.planetphillip.com/posts/the-great-forever-tomorrow-half-life-2-ep2/
